item.title: This is zaap studio
item.description: Without future plans, we decide to set up our studio named “zaap”, which is written as「雜」in Chinese/kanji.

item.title: sketch street views [WIP]
item.description: This research project is in progress…

item.title: about「雜」zaap
item.description: What is it? zaap is set up as a design studio for the design and research exploration about built environments and even more. Where is it? zaap is based in the complex universe. Who are we? We are just self-motivated designers. Road map No, we don’t have it. Our people Xiaohao YANG/Qingru YANG
